name: Black Works Studio - Lizard King - Event Only
additionalNotes: The NBK Lizard King cigar is a limited release by Black Works Studio that will blow your mind. Not literally, but its definitely worthy of a spot in your humidor. Rocking the barber pole style, this cigar utilizes an Ecuadorian Maduro and an Ecuadorian Rojiso wrapper â€“ both rich and delicious. The dual wrapper allows for extra strength and a bit more spice in the flavor than the original NBK (which stands for Natural Born Killer). The binder and filler consist of aged Nicaraguan tobaccos all grown directly from their Fabrica Oveja Negra factory.
